text: Ornaments from the Silver Arcade is the third full-length album by Young Knives, released in the United Kingdom on 4 April 2011 on the Gadzook label. The track "Love My Name" was released as a single on 14 March 2011. ==Track listing== # "Love My Name" – 3:14 # "Woman" – 3:47 # "Everything Falls Into Place" – 3:05 # "Human Again" – 3:41 # "Running from a Standing Start" – 3:11 # "Sister Frideswide" – 3:58 # "Vision in Rags" – 3:29 # "Go to Ground" – 3:59 # "Silver Tongue" – 3:39 # "Storm Clouds" – 2:33 # "Glasshouse" – 4:50 ==(iTunes Bonus Track)== # "Her Pearls" - 3:08 ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Young Knives albums
title: Ornaments from the Silver Arcade
